name: Bay Cottage Bed & Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the occasion to stay at Bay Cottage B&B ( with Norman and Elizabeth ) for one night as we needed to be at the airport early the next day in May.
reviews.title: Lovely Luxurious B&B in nice rural location with great views

aka: Bay Cottage Bed & Breakfast Aldergrove, County Antrim, Northern Ireland
